sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' export default function StakePool() { const [activeStep, setActivestep] = useState('Add or create pool'); const [stakeactive, setStakeactive] = useState('stake'); return (
{ activeStep == "Add or create pool" ? PoolCreate() : activeStep == "pool details" ? PoolDetails() : activeStep == "View Pool" ? ViewPool() : null }
) }
